root.name: Dora The Explorer: Dora Saves The Snow Princess
root.description: IntroductionTwo versions of this game came out across three platforms: Wii, PS2 and Nintendo DS.WIi and PS2 version developed by High Voltage Nintendo DS version developed by Black Lantern Studios. It is designed to played by a preschool age (3-5) child and is based off the direct-to-video Dora movie of the same title. PremiseAn evil witch has cast a curse over the Magic Snowy Forest causing it to begin melting. Now it is up to you to stop the forest from melting away with the help of your friends, old and new. GameplayDora Saves the Snow Princess has 3 modes: Adventure Mode - A storybook style adventure alternating between a still motion narrative and mini-games. Progress is saved after each mini-game.Replay Adventure - Replay any of the mini-games from the Adventure mode.Snowy Forest - Non-story related mini-games, such as dress-the-snowman and find-the-animals.
